summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2870, for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest from West Dakota Street to West Edmunds Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 34944 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
